metadata.note: This is a RECOVERY TOOL (decryptor), not an attack tool. Presence indicates prior ransomware infection and victim ransom payment. Low detection priority.

hardcoded_keys.purpose: Decrypts files encrypted by Arsenal-237 encryptors (enc_c2.exe, new_enc.exe)
hardcoded_keys.scope: Per-Victim (ONE victim only, different key in each decryptor)

related_samples.key_comparison: DIFFERENT - confirms per-victim architecture (NOT universal master key)

cryptographic_algorithm.purpose: Authenticated decryption of Arsenal-237 encrypted files

cryptographic_indicators.operational_significance: Per-victim key architecture proves professional RaaS operations. Each victim receives unique decryptor with embedded victim-specific key.

command_line.purpose: Batch decryption of victim's encrypted files
command_line.description: Recursively processes A-Z subdirectories for encrypted file decryption

file_operations.pattern: Arsenal-237 encrypted files matching custom format
file_operations.detection_method: Directory access patterns, file enumeration monitoring

file_operations.pattern: File creation with original filename restoration
file_operations.detection_method: File creation monitoring in encrypted directories

file_operations.target: Original encrypted files and readme.txt ransom notes
file_operations.detection_method: File deletion monitoring, ransom note cleanup tracking

directory_structure.description: Mirrors Arsenal-237 encryptor's file organization by first character
directory_structure.significance: Indicates proper integration with Arsenal-237 campaign infrastructure

static_strings.string: Decryption failed - wrong key or corrupted file

static_strings.context: File size less than minimum (16 bytes for auth tag)
Master key parsing failure (should not occur with hardcoded key)
Target for automatic deletion after successful decryption

format_specification.description: Original file content encrypted with ChaCha20
AEAD authentication tag for integrity verification

file_format_example.description: Logical layout of Arsenal-237 encrypted file

validation_checks.requirement: Poly1305 MAC must match computed value
validation_checks.failure_message: Decryption failed - wrong key or corrupted file

mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: TEB-based debugger detection in initialization sequence
mitre_attack_mapping.context: Inherited from encryptor samples; defense mechanism for reverse engineering prevention

mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Recursive enumeration of A-Z subdirectories; structure-based file identification
mitre_attack_mapping.context: Locates encrypted files matching Arsenal-237 campaign encryption pattern

mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: ChaCha20-Poly1305 AEAD decryption; reverses ransomware encryption
mitre_attack_mapping.context: REVERSES encryption, NOT applies it; enables victim file recovery
Standard CLI tool usage pattern for batch decryption specification

per_victim_architecture.finding: Per-victim key architecture CONFIRMED (NOT universal master key)
evidence: Keys are DIFFERENT (56 of 64 hex characters differ)
Confirms per-victim key system, not universal master key
per_victim_architecture.operational_significance: Each victim receives unique decryptor with their specific victim key embedded. Professional RaaS model.

victim_count_estimate.basis: Multiple different hardcoded keys across analyzed samples
victim_count_estimate.implication: Arsenal-237 is active, ongoing campaign with multiple successful victims

evidence: Post-payment support model (dec_fixed version suggests corrected decryptor)
Professional error handling and customer communication
Version management (dec_fixed implies initial version failure and fix)
operational_model.implication: Organized, professional threat actor with established business processes

indicators: Secure coding practices (constant-time comparison, path traversal prevention)
Robust error handling with descriptive messages

related_samples.relationship: Encryptor variant with same cryptographic parameters
related_samples.shared_features: ChaCha20-Poly1305 AEAD, TEB debugger detection, A-Z directory structure
related_samples.note: dec_fixed.exe decrypts files encrypted by enc_c2.exe

related_samples.shared_features: ChaCha20-Poly1305 AEAD, encrypted file format, A-Z directory structure
related_samples.note: dec_fixed.exe can decrypt files encrypted by new_enc.exe IF key matches (it doesn't for this sample)

threat_intelligence_value.primary_value: Confirms professional per-victim key architecture in Arsenal-237 RaaS operations
threat_intelligence_value.secondary_value: Demonstrates post-payment support model and customer service infrastructure
threat_intelligence_value.tertiary_value: Provides cryptographic implementation details for detection rule development
threat_intelligence_value.forensic_value: Hardcoded key enables victim identification and recovery capability assessment
threat_intelligence_value.campaign_tracking: Per-victim keys indicate multiple victims; key diversity enables victim count estimation
threat_intelligence_value.overall_significance: MEDIUM-HIGH - Represents operational confirmation of professional RaaS model, not isolated incident

string_based.indicator: "Decryption failed - wrong key or corrupted file"

behavioral.use_case: Detection of encrypted file recovery operations

if_victim_identified: Preserve forensic evidence before decryption attempt
Contact incident response firm for professional support
Selective decryption (critical files first, preserve others for investigation)
Post-recovery forensic investigation to determine initial breach vector
for_threat_intelligence: Document per-victim key architecture in campaign profile
Estimate victim count from key diversity across samples
Track operational model indicators (post-payment support, versioning)
Share decryptor analysis with threat intelligence community
Coordinate with law enforcement on investigation status
Consider public disclosure via No More Ransom Project (if appropriate)
for_defenders: Develop detection rules for Arsenal-237 encryptor samples (primary prevention focus)
Monitor for command-line execution of dec_fixed.exe variants
Track A-Z directory enumeration patterns in monitoring
Alert on large-scale file deletion operations (ransom notes)
Implement infrastructure blocking for identified C2 servers (from enc_c2.exe analysis)
Security awareness training on phishing/initial compromise prevention
